attributes.action: request that HRH Queen Elizabeth II dissolve parliament .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In accordance with constitutional convention, the Prime Minister must seek permission from the Sovereign in order to dissolve the House of Commons. It is time for the people to make a choice on whom they want to run the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
